MonsterTrait.Name: Rampage
MonsterTrait.Text: When the witherling reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The witherling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its club, or two with its club.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Club
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Vengeful Strike
MonsterTrait.Text: In response to a gnoll being reduced to 0 hit points within 30 feet of the witherling, the witherling makes a melee attack.
